titleStmt.title: An act enabling such Commissioners of Sewers as acted on the 19th of April 1653. to act as Commissioners of Sewers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Wednesday the 18th of May 1659. Signed: Tho. St. Nicholas Clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
